data.prayer: Spirit, help the 12 believers find a person of peace today among the 7,388 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aracinovo, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Aracinovo be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Aracinovo, North Macedonia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 12 believers in Aracinovo and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Albanian, Macedonian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Albanian, Macedonian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Albanian, Macedonian people is yours.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Aracinovo, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Aracinovo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Aracinovo, North Macedonia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
